parameters.name: ImageFamily
parameters.description:
The family name of the image that you want to use to create the instances.

You can configure image families for custom images, public images, community images, and shared images. For more information, see [Overview of image families](~~174241~~).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which to create the custom image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
